Uses of Class
jwiki.core.Reply

  • Packages that use Reply 
    Package Description
    jwiki.core
    Contains the main classes in jwiki.
    jwiki.dwrap
    Contains data storage formats for jwiki.

    • Uses of Reply in jwiki.core

      Methods in jwiki.core that return Reply 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Reply QueryTools.doSingleQuery(Wiki wiki, URLBuilder ub)
      Send a single query to the server and read the reply.
      Reply Reply.getJSONObjectR(String key)
      Recursively search this ServerReply for a key, and return it's associated value as a JSONObject.
      Methods in jwiki.core that return types with arguments of type Reply 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<Reply> Reply.bigJSONObjectGet(String key)
      Gets a list of JSONObjects contained in a single JSONObject.
      static ArrayList<Reply> QueryTools.doGroupQuery(Wiki wiki, URLBuilder ub, String tkey, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Performs a group query for multiple titles.
      static ArrayList<Reply> QueryTools.doLimitedQuery(Wiki wiki, URLBuilder ub, String limString, int cap, String tkey, String title)
      Performs a series of queries on a single item but restricts number of returned entries.
      static ArrayList<Reply> QueryTools.doMultiQuery(Wiki wiki, URLBuilder ub, String limString, String tkey, ArrayList<String> titles)
      Performs a multi-query on a URL.
      static ArrayList<Reply> QueryTools.doNoTitleMultiQuery(Wiki wiki, URLBuilder ub)
      Performs a multi-query on a URL.
      ArrayList<Reply> Reply.getJSONArrayListR(String key)
      Recursively search this Reply for a a JSONArray and return the contained JSONObjects in an ArrayList.
      Methods in jwiki.core with parameters of type Reply 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean QueryTools.applyContinue(URLBuilder ub, Reply r)
      Identifies the continue JSONObject in a Reply and applies it to a URLBuilder.

      Constructors in jwiki.dwrap with parameters of type Reply 
      Constructor and Description
      Contrib(Reply r)
      Creates a Contrib object from a JSONObject returned by the server, representing a single contribution.
      ImageInfo(Reply r)
      Constructor, takes a JSONObject containing image info returned by the server.
      Revision(String title, Reply r)
      Constructor, creates a revision object.
